channel.title: CVE Feed for Novell -- eDirectory
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Novell -- eDirectory

item.title: CVE-2017-9267|2024-09-16T17:52:55.859Z -- novell -- edirectory
item.description: In Novell eDirectory before 9.0.3.1 the LDAP interface was not strictly enforcing cipher restrictions allowing weaker ciphers to be used during SSL BIND operations.
